short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts prices on websites to hours of work needed to afford them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
> If you earn $30 an hour, your new phone isn't $999, it's 33 hours of your life.

We always say "time is money", but what about the opposite - "money is time"? How much time are you actually spending on this new phone you're buying? - What's the real cost?

TheRealCost is a a Chrome extension that converts prices on websites to hours of work needed to afford them.

üåü Features!
* Detects and converts (replace) prices on web pages to hours
* Hover over prices to further visualize the hours, which is different depending on the amount
* Customizable currency, wage, work hours per day and more!
* Light / dark mode
* Site-specific settings (e.g. disable replacement or extension on specific websites)
* Multi-language support 
* Supports multiple currencies
* Setup tour
* Clean and simple UI
* Replaced text follows website style
